001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.AnalogInput;
004
005/** Class for analog sensors
006 * @author Alex Stedman
007 */
008@SuppressWarnings("unused")
009public class AnalogSensor extends Sensor<AnalogInput> {
010
011    /** Make an analog sensor
012     *
013     * @param device The analog device
014     */
015    public AnalogSensor(AnalogInput device) {
016        super(device);
017    }
018
019    /** Make an analog sensor
020     *
021     * @param deviceName The device name in hardware map
022     */
023    public AnalogSensor(String deviceName) {
024        super(deviceName);
025    }
026
027    public double getSensorValue() {
028        return getDevice().getMaxVoltage();
029    }
030}
